text:
With JavaDoc task (ANT 1.6.3) JVM=1.5.0_06
Any all attempts to use sourcepath="FullyQualifiedFolderSpec" produce 
'no packages found' BUT qualifying individual source files via
sourcefiles="FullyQualifiedFolderSpec/Java1.java"
does work as valid input to the Javadoc task

I am treating this as a bug since the same spec FullyQualifiedFolderSpec is 
valid when used in sourcefiles but does NOT work when SAME 
FullyQualifiedFolderSpec value is used for sourcepath

Martin Gainty-
creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
jkf@apache.org
text:
Could you please provide the build snippets used to produce the fault.

Also, please note that the the sourcepath is merely an indication on where to
find the sources, while the sourcefiles is a list of files to be translated.
When using the sourcepath it is necessary to specify the packagenames /
enclosing packages as well.

No description of how the <javadoc> task is different
from the javadoc command line  program (<javadoc> is
a simple wrapper for the javadoc command).
Marking as invalid.
